data.title: Ranch wear and Accessories
data.meta_description: Flat Hat Rags has hand made wild rags, affordable ranch clothing and products featuring hand-drawn horse and other ranch images in a variety of disciplines and events.  Product selection includes jackets, vests, sweatshirts, tees, pillows, decal stickers, face masks and a variety of slides, jewelry and accessories.
data.text:
FLAT HAT RAGS IS DEDICATED TO BRINGING YOU UNIQUE HAND DRAWN DESIGNS YOU WONT FIND ANYWHERE ELSE IN MANY MEDIAS INCLUDING EMBROIDERY, HEAT TRANSFER, VINYL DECALS, WOOD BURNING, AND PAINTING.

​

WE ALSO SPECIALIZE IN TOP QUALITY HANDMADE WILD RAGS IN A LARGE SELECTION OF PRINTS AND SIZES TO MEET YOUR NEEDS FROM STANDARD SIZES TO THE LARGEST AROUND AS WELL AS SMALL SCARVES FOR YOUTH AND WESTERN HORSE SHOW ACCENT SCARVES.

Flat Hat Rags offers many unique items for all age groups and disciplines, from ranch and working gear to english and western jackets, shirts and home decor as well as decals to decorate your truck and trailer.

​

Visit the designs page to see all of our available designs or send us a request for something new if you don't see a design that fits your discipline or style. We are always adding new designs!

​

We offer custom embroidery and vinyl decals and signs as well as woodwork so if you are looking for top quality embroidery of your brand or logo send us an email to discuss pricing and options!

We periodically travel to events around the country. This allows us to take product to where our customers can see first-hand the quality and detail of our products. During this time shipping may be delayed. Click on the button above to see our list of events we will be attending!
